problems.title: Right Triangle Star Pattern
problems.description:
Print a right triangle pattern using asterisks (*).

Input Format:
A single integer N representing the number of rows.

Output Format:
Print a right triangle pattern with N rows. Each row should have increasing number of stars starting from 1.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
*
**
***
****
*****

Sample Input
3

Sample Output
*
**
***
hintsList: Use nested loops - outer loop for rows and inner loop for columns. Print '*' for each column up to the current row number.

problems.title: Inverted Right Triangle Star Pattern
problems.description:
Print an inverted right triangle pattern using asterisks (*).

Input Format:
A single integer N representing the number of rows.

Output Format:
Print an inverted right triangle pattern with N rows. Each row should have decreasing number of stars starting from N.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
*****
****
***
**
*

Sample Input
3

Sample Output
***
**
*
hintsList: Use nested loops - outer loop from N down to 1, inner loop prints stars from 1 to current row number.

problems.title: Pyramid Star Pattern
problems.description:
Print a pyramid pattern using asterisks (*).

Input Format:
A single integer N representing the number of rows.

Output Format:
Print a pyramid pattern with N rows. The pyramid should be centered with spaces before each row.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
    *
   ***
  *****
 *******
*********

Sample Input
3

Sample Output
  *
 ***
*****
hintsList: Use three parts: spaces before stars (decreasing), stars (increasing by 2 each row), and newline. First row has (N-1) spaces and 1 star, second row has (N-2) spaces and 3 stars, etc.

problems.title: Number Triangle Pattern
problems.description:
Print a right triangle pattern using numbers starting from 1.

Input Format:
A single integer N representing the number of rows.

Output Format:
Print a number triangle with N rows. Each row should print numbers from 1 to the row number.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
1
12
123
1234
12345

Sample Input
3

Sample Output
1
12
123
hintsList: Use nested loops - outer loop for rows (1 to N), inner loop prints numbers from 1 to current row number.

problems.title: Reverse Number Triangle Pattern
problems.description:
Print a reverse number triangle pattern where each row starts from the row number and decreases to 1.

Input Format:
A single integer N representing the number of rows.

Output Format:
Print a reverse number triangle with N rows. Each row should print numbers from the row number down to 1.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
54321
4321
321
21
1

Sample Input
3

Sample Output
321
21
1
hintsList: Use nested loops - outer loop from N down to 1, inner loop prints numbers from current row number down to 1.

problems.title: Alphabet Triangle Pattern
problems.description:
Print a right triangle pattern using uppercase letters starting from 'A'.

Input Format:
A single integer N representing the number of rows.

Output Format:
Print an alphabet triangle with N rows. Each row should print letters from 'A' to the current row letter.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
A
AB
ABC
ABCD
ABCDE

Sample Input
3

Sample Output
A
AB
ABC

testCases.expectedOutput:
A
AB
ABC
ABCD
ABCDE
ABCDEF
ABCDEFG

hintsList: Use nested loops - outer loop for rows (1 to N), inner loop prints characters from 'A' (ASCII 65) to 'A' + current row - 1.

problems.title: Square Star Pattern
problems.description:
Print a square pattern using asterisks (*).

Input Format:
A single integer N representing the number of rows and columns.

Output Format:
Print a square pattern with N rows and N columns filled with asterisks.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
*****
*****
*****
*****
*****

Sample Input
3

Sample Output
***
***
***
hintsList: Use nested loops - both outer and inner loops run from 1 to N. Print '*' for each column in every row.

problems.title: Hollow Square Pattern
problems.description:
Print a hollow square pattern using asterisks (*). Only the border should be filled with stars, the interior should be empty (spaces).

Input Format:
A single integer N representing the number of rows and columns.

Output Format:
Print a hollow square pattern with N rows and N columns. Border should have stars, interior should have spaces.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
*****
*   *
*   *
*   *
*****

Sample Input
3

Sample Output
***
* *
***
hintsList: Print '*' for first row, last row, first column, and last column. Print space for all other positions.

problems.title: Same Number Triangle Pattern
problems.description:
Print a right triangle pattern where each row contains the same number repeated, starting from 1.

Input Format:
A single integer N representing the number of rows.

Output Format:
Print a number triangle with N rows. Each row should print the row number repeated as many times as the row number.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
1
22
333
4444
55555

Sample Input
3

Sample Output
1
22
333
hintsList: Use nested loops - outer loop for rows (1 to N), inner loop prints the row number repeated for the current row number of times.

problems.title: Same Alphabet Triangle Pattern
problems.description:
Print a right triangle pattern where each row contains the same uppercase letter repeated, starting from 'A'.

Input Format:
A single integer N representing the number of rows.

Output Format:
Print an alphabet triangle with N rows. Each row should print the same letter repeated as many times as the row number. Row 1 has 'A', row 2 has 'B', etc.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
A
BB
CCC
DDDD
EEEEE

Sample Input
3

Sample Output
A
BB
CCC

testCases.expectedOutput:
A
BB
CCC
DDDD
EEEEE
FFFFFF
GGGGGGG

hintsList: Use nested loops - outer loop for rows (1 to N), inner loop prints the letter corresponding to current row ('A' + row - 1) repeated for the current row number of times.
